from sys import stdin
test=int(stdin.readline())
for i in xrange(test):
	n=int(stdin.readline())
	arr=map(int,stdin.readline().split())
	dep=map(int,stdin.readline().split())
	arr.sort()
	dep.sort()
	maxg,nog,i,j=0,0,0,0
	while i<len(arr):
		if arr[i]==dep[j]:
			i+=1
			j+=1
		elif arr[i]<dep[j]:
			nog+=1
			if nog>maxg:
				maxg=nog
			i+=1
		else:
			nog-=1
			j+=1
	print maxg
